description: The file 'util.h' defines utility function prototypes related to resource management, input handling, and mode stringification within the zilker-sdk project. It contains function declarations for resource dumping, resource value retrieval, user input processing, tokenization, and mode string translation.

methods.name: getResourceDump
methods.description: Dumps all details of a resource into a newly allocated string for user inspection.

methods.name: getResourceValue
methods.description: Retrieves the value of a resource, considering whether it is marked as sensitive.

methods.name: getInputLine
methods.description: Reads a line of input from the user interactively.

methods.name: getTokenizedInput
methods.description: Tokenizes a user-input line into an array of tokens.

methods.name: stringifyMode
methods.description: Converts resource mode flags into a human-readable string similar to 'ls -l' permissions.
